flight-to-boise.title: Help Me Recoup My Flight To Boise
flight-to-boise.tagline: Opening for rapper and producer Mark Battles
flight-to-boise.details: Covers round trip, a room, and meals.
flight-to-boise.storyWhat: I just hit 100 monthly listeners on Spotify...and if you’ve ever been to a house concert, a hundred people is a packed crowd. So, thank you. Since streaming has yet to pay the bills, I ask my supporters to help me cover this trip as proof that I can monetize my work. I recently won a “Submit Your Music” competition to open for Mark Battles, an internationally touring rapper and producer from Indiana. On Tuesday evening, October 14th, I’ll perform a 15-minute set in front of many new faces, a once-in-a-lifetime chance to share my music and message. I plan to film the experience and bring everyone along for the ride. Thanks again for your contributions to my independent artistry!
flight-to-boise.risks: Flight prices may change quickly; any excess will go toward future projects.

faq.a: October 14th 2025, part of Mark Battles’ tour stop in Boise.
Any contribution helps cover the flight.
